rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
每日食用西梅对心血管健康相关的生物标志物具有良好的影响今天在美国营养学会 (ASN) 年会上以摘要形式提交的两项新研究报告称，每日食用西梅对与心血管健康相关的多种生物标志物具有良好的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Daily-prune-conspiration-has-promising-effects-on-biomarkers-lated-to-cardioangio-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Daily-prune-conspiration-has-promising-effects-on-biomarkers-lated-to-cardioangio-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9652c80d-2409-4561-84d3-97973604dce2 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 15:42:07 -0400 Daily prune consumption has promising effects on biomarkers related to cardiovascular health
研究表明，零食的质量比数量或频率更重要零食越来越受欢迎，超过 70% 的人表示他们每天至少吃两次零食。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Quality-of-snacking-matters-more-than-quantity-or-Frequency-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Quality-of-snacking-matters-more-than-quantity-or-Frequency-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4611f2ba-a310-47a0-843e-e9505cd49ec4 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 15:34:47 -0400 Quality of snacking matters more than quantity or frequency, study shows
研究揭示了减缓阿尔茨海默病进展的新方法凯斯西储大学研究人员的一项新研究表明，通过抑制大脑中导致腐蚀的特定蛋白质，可以减缓阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Study-reveals-new-way-to-slow-progression-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Study-reveals-new-way-to-slow-progression-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7ae97cb-8bc8-4b2e-8bae-7a6f1550842b Mon, 24 Jul 2023 15:25:28 -0400 Study reveals new way to slow progression of Alzheimer's disease
新研究量化了流感儿童神经精神事件的发生率虽然美国儿童中与流感相关的神经精神事件的发生率尚不清楚，但关于使用通常用于治疗儿童流感的常见抗病毒药物的争议引起了家长和医疗专业人员的关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-study-quantizes-the-incidence-of-neuropsychiatric-events-in-children-with-flu.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-study-quantizes-the-incidence-of-neuropsychiatric-events-in-children-with-flu.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0959b3e4-9eb7-4220-8560-e758ff539f73 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 15:23:03 -0400 New study quantifies the incidence of neuropsychiatric events in children with flu
对浪费的新认识可能会带来更好的感染治疗方法尽管感染可能会出现许多不同的症状，但一个常见的症状是脂肪和肌肉的减少，这一过程称为消瘦。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-understanding-of-wasting-could-lead-to-better-treatments-for-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-understanding-of-wasting-could-lead-to-better-treatments-for-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df62175d-b309-47c3-98ca-ae2087ca2d84 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 15:20:55 -0400 New understanding of wasting could lead to better treatments for infections
从小鼠胚胎干细胞中产生功能性甲状旁腺再生医学为医学界开辟了令人兴奋的可能性。现在，日本的研究人员正在寻找重建身体组织和器官的方法，这可能是治疗疾病的另一种方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Generate-function-paratherapy-glands-from-mouse-embryonic-stem-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Generate-function-paratherapy-glands-from-mouse-embryonic-stem-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7fb958a-d2a0-4756-ae08-78324b1ec8ae Mon, 24 Jul 2023 14:47:52 -0400 Generating functional parathyroid glands from mouse embryonic stem cells
研究表明，超过三分之一的新英格兰学院和大学在 PrEP 获取方面存在巨大差距年轻同性恋、双性恋和其他男男性行为者 (MSM) 占 2018 年 13-24 岁青少年新发艾滋病毒感染者的 80%，是艾滋病毒预防的重点人群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Study-reveals-substantial-gap-in-PrEP-access-in-more-than-one-third-of-New-England-colleges-and-universities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Study-reveals-substantial-gap-in-PrEP-access-in-more-than-one-third-of-New-England-colleges-and-universities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83e03032-a120-45bc-9db7-4f654d3f8734 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 14:24:28 -0400 Study reveals substantial gap in PrEP access in more than one-third of New England colleges and universities
改善肠道健康可能是减缓艾滋病毒进展为艾滋病的关键匹兹堡大学传染病科学家今天在《JCI Insight》杂志上发表的一项新研究表明，恢复和改善肠道健康可能是减缓艾滋病毒进展为艾滋病的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Improving-gut-health-may-be-key-to-slowing-HIV-progression-to-AIDS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Improving-gut-health-may-be-key-to-slowing-HIV-progression-to-AIDS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=233705ac-8b82-4d5e-a62e-8346dd2c7d8a Mon, 24 Jul 2023 14:09:37 -0400 Improving gut health may be key to slowing HIV progression to AIDS
研究发现致癌基因在衰老中也起着至关重要的作用根据匹兹堡 UPMC 儿童医院和匹兹堡大学医学院的研究人员进行的一项新的 Cell Reports 研究，一种名为 Myc（发音为“mick”）的基因是小鼠和人类癌症最重要的驱动因素之一，它在衰老过程中也发挥着新的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Cancer-causing-gene-also-plays-a-crucial-role-in-aging-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Cancer-causing-gene-also-plays-a-crucial-role-in-aging-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=610ebae2-f17e-4528-b3e3-86ef628f6342 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 14:03:56 -0400 Cancer-causing gene also plays a crucial role in aging, study finds
研究获得 1050 万美元资助，用于比较两种改善骨折患者预后的护理模式晚年骨折是导致残疾、复发性骨折、疗养院安置和死亡的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Study-receives-24105-million-funding-to-compare-two-care-models-for-improving-outcomes-in-fracture-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Study-receives-24105-million-funding-to-compare-two-care-models-for-improving-outcomes-in-fracture-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f74cb915-4fe7-4d96-928f-5b15da6b30fd Mon, 24 Jul 2023 13:48:19 -0400 Study receives $10.5 million funding to compare two care models for improving outcomes in fracture patients
